types:type.name: event-proc-metadata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type event_proc_metadata = {| ID: String, titulo: String, descricao: String, data_abertura: String, check_view: Null, data_conc_esp: String, data_conclusao: Null, equipa_respons: Number {"typeId": "int"}, TL_email: String, status: Boolean, categoria_ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, prioridade_ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, validacao_client: Boolean, first_email: Null, second_email: Null |} {"example": "{\\\"ID\\\":\\\"9\\\",\\\"titulo\\\":\\\"Preciso de Ajuda\\\",\\\"descricao\\\":\\\"Minha Aplica\u00E7\u00E3o n\u00E3o est\u00E1 a funcionar corretamente\\\",\\\"data_abertura\\\":\\\"2024-02-07T14:00:00\\\",\\\"check_view\\\":null,\\\"data_conc_esp\\\":\\\"2024-02-07T17:00:00\\\",\\\"data_conclusao\\\":null,\\\"equipa_respons\\\":1,\\\"TL_email\\\":\\\"joaodev8@gmail.com\\\",\\\"status\\\":false,\\\"categoria_ID\\\":1,\\\"prioridade_ID\\\":1,\\\"validacao_client\\\":false,\\\"first_email\\\":null,\\\"second_email\\\":null}"}
